description: Paris is no longer a virus hotspot but will need careful monitoring, PM Edouard Philippe says.
title: Coronavirus: France to reopen cafes, bars and restaurants
title_page: Coronavirus: France to reopen cafes, bars and restaurants - BBC News
maintext: The capital is now designated as an "orange" zone on the country's coronavirus risk map, Mr Philippe said. Almost all other French regions have "green" status, meaning they are more free of the virus.
